title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8051.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8051.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 87. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 87 between the Orange-Ulster county
line and the Ulster-Greene county line in the City of Kingston and Towns of

Plattekill, Lloyd, Esopus, Ulster and Saugerties. (b) IR 587. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of IR 587 between IR 87 and Route 32 in the Town of Ulster and City of

Kingston. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8051.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
